title: 1993) after consultation with the National Roads Authority hereby order as
heading: 3. The Order of 2012 is amended in Schedule 1 by the substitution of the
text_raw:
3. The Order of 2012 is amended in Schedule 1 by the substitution of the 
following for the matter in column (2) opposite the mention of the national 
primary road N22 in column (1): 

“Merchants Quay, County Cork – Manor East, County Kerry 

Between its junction with N8 at Merchant’s Quay in the city of Cork and 
its junction with N21 at Manor East in the county of Kerry via Saint 
Patrick’s Street, Grand Parade, Washington Street, Washington Street 
West, Lancaster Quay, Western Road (and via Mardyke Walk, Dyke 
Parade, Sheare’s Street and Court House Street), Victoria Cross, 
Carrigrohane Road, Carrigrohane, Curraheen, Greenfield and Lisheens in 
the city of Cork: Barnagore, Oven’s Bridge, Currahaly Cross, Farnane’s 
Bypass, Inchirahilly, Stage Cross, Lissardagh, Coolcour, Coolyhane, 
Gurteenroe, Carrigaphoca, Tonn Láin, An Sliabh Riabhach and 
Droichead an Choimín in the county of Cork: Derryreagh, Clonkeen, 
Poulgorm Bridge, Garries Bridge, Glenflesk, Clasheen and Lissyviggeen; 
Woodford Bridge, Ballycasheen, Killarney Bypass and Ardnamweely at 
Killarney; Cleeny, Rockfield Bridge, Lawlor’s Cross, Boolacullane, 
Farranfore, Garraundarragh, Gortatlea Bridge, Clashedmond and Camp 
in the county of Kerry.”.

title: 1993) after consultation with the National Roads Authority hereby order as
heading: The Order of 2012 is amended in Schedule 2 by the substitution of the
text_raw:
4. 
The Order of 2012 is amended in Schedule 2 by the substitution of the 
following for the matter in column (2) opposite the mention of the national 
secondary road N78 in column (1): 

“Hennebry’s Cross, County Kilkenny – Mullamast, County Kildare 

Between its junction with N77 at Hennebry’s Cross in the county of 
Kilkenny and its junction with M9 at Mullamast in the county of Kildare 
via Mohil, Damerstown West; Kilkenny Street and The Square at 
Castlecomer; and Coolbaun in the county of Kilkenny: Crettyard Bridge 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th April, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [130] 3 

at the boundary between the county of Kilkenny and the county of Laois: 
Crettyard, Newtown Cross, Wandesford Bridge, Simmon’s Cross and 
Ballylynan in the county of Laois: Bennetsbridge, Athy Distributor Road, 
Gallowshill and Burtown Big in the county of Kildare.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 March, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [130]

title: 1993) after consultation with the National Roads Authority hereby order as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order amends the Schedule of the Roads Act 1993 (Classification of 
National Roads) Order 2012 (S.I. No. 53 of 2012) to address road classification 
issues regarding a number of national roads in County Cork, County Kerry, 
County Kilkenny and County Kildare. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [130] 5
